short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically append the York U proxy URL (*.ezproxy.library.yorku.ca) to the page you are currently on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of pasting .ezproxy.library.yorku.ca into the link, or searching through the York libraries website, you can click the extension and sign in.
